---
title: "1. Literate Programming"
subtitle: "A simple subtitle to fill the space."
description: |
  In this recipe, we will learn how to create a simple literate programming document using Quarto in RStudio. You will be introduced to the basic syntax of Quarto and learn how generate HTML and PDF output formats.
categories: [preface]
---





## Hello world

This is a simple example of a literate programming document. It is written in R Markdown and uses the `webexercises` package to create interactive exercises.

![](r_logo.png)

### You are cool!
